law.catch_line: For purposes of § 17-322(b) of this subtitle, it is not a material fact relating to property offere...

text.section:
For purposes of § 17-322(b) of this subtitle, it is not a material fact relating to property offered for sale or lease that:
an owner or occupant of the property is, was, or is suspected to be:
infected with human immunodeficiency virus; or
diagnosed with acquired immunodeficiency syndrome; or
a homicide, suicide, accidental death, natural death, or felony occurred on the property.

section.section: It is not grounds for a disciplinary action against a licensee under this subtitle, that a licensee did not disclose to a prospective purchaser or lessee, a fact contained in subsection (a) of this section.
A licensee may not be held personally liable for failure to disclose a fact contained in subsection (a) of this section.
